Entry.JapaneseText: 今度こそ本当に <Cyan>「雲海にそびえし塔」<White>なんだよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think this time we've found the actual "<Cyan>tower that soars above a sea of clouds<White>?"

Entry.JapaneseText: あんなに苦労して見つけたんだもの。 今度こそ、そうであってほしいわ。
Entry.EnglishText: After all that we went through to find it, I hope that it's what we were looking for.

Entry.JapaneseText: 違っても、また探す楽しみが できるじゃない。ね？
Entry.EnglishText: Even if it's not, then we can still have fun going on another search. Right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>って前向きね。 わたしなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: You have a positive outlook... As for me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫、大丈夫。 <Annie>もずいぶん前向きになったと思うヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's fine, it's fine. I think you've become pretty positive too!
